page.title: 10Choppington Welfare
page.content: Choppington Welfare plays an important part in community life. It is usually open from 9.OO am until 1O.OO pm 7 days a week. Many activities and functions take place there. These include The Tea Timers' Club, Youth Club, Over 6O's, After Strokes, Leek Club, Darts League, Tuesday Dance, Thursday Dance, Terrier Club, W.I, Soroptimists, Boxing, Keep-fit, Burns Night, Disco's,Five-a-side Football and a Mothers' and Toddlers' group. 'Mind' have an office there. It is available for functions such as Weddings, Dances, Birthdays etc. The Centre has a Warden, Caretaker and Domestic Staff. There are Summer and Autumn Fayres to raise funds for the centre.
